Subskills.name: Earth Master
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of earth totems.

Subskills.name: Rapid Earth
Subskills.description: Increases attack speed of earth totem.

Subskills.name: Entangling Roots
Subskills.description: Unleash a trail of earth roots traveling towards the target rooting monsters on hit and dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Fragmenting Totemstones
Subskills.description: Chance for rocks to unleash fragments upon landing dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Earth God
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by earth totem.

Subskills.name: Runic Earth
Subskills.description: Increases the size of earth totem.

Subskills.name: Dense Earth
Subskills.description: Chance for rocks to bounce off the ground unleashing additional explosions.

Subskills.name: Stunning Earth
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Wind Totem
Subskills.description: Earth totem unleashes multiple piercing tornados.

Subskills.name: Ravaging Earth
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned enemies.

Subskills.name: Double Boulder
Subskills.description: Chance for earth totem to unleash an additional rock.

Subskills.name: Earth Caller
Subskills.description: Spawn an additional earth totem per cast.

Subskills.name: Fragmented Volley
Subskills.description: Earth totem unleashes a volley of smaller rocks. Earth totem attack speed is decreased.

Subskills.name: The Rolling Stones
Subskills.description: Earth totem unleashes rolling boulders inflicting arcane break and knocking monsters back on hit.
